mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO movie_big_image_relation (movie_id, bigImageId) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{bigImageId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM movie_big_image_relation WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND big_image_id = #{bigImageId}
mapper.select: select * from movie_big_image_relation WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND big_image_id = #{bigImageId}
